thread.title_full: No rift anymore? Sanjay Dutt’s wife Maanayata posts selfie with his daughter Trishala | bollywood | Hindustan Times

title: No rift anymore? Sanjay Dutt’s wife Maanayata posts selfie with his daughter Trishala | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
No rift anymore? Sanjay Dutt’s wife Maanayata posts selfie with his daughter Trishala bollywood Updated: Feb 13, 2017 10:46 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Sanjay Dutt and Maanayata married in 2008 and they have two children. 
The Dutt ladies have put all the rumours of a feud between them to rest. Sanjay Dutt’s wife Maanayata has posted a selfie on her Instagram account in which she can be seen with the actor’s daughter from his first wife Richa Sharma, Trishala. A photo posted by Maanayata Dutt (@maanayata) on Feb 11, 2017 at 9:13pm PST 
Trishala lives in the US and is an entrepreneur. 
On the work front, Sanjay Dutt is trying to stage a comeback in Bollywood after a gap of three years. His last appearance was in Rajkumar Hirani’s PK in 2014. Read more
